alert.note: Alert for Genesee; Niagara; Northern Erie; Wyoming (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A thunderstorm with heavy rainfall will impact portions of northwestern Wyoming, northeastern Erie, southern Niagara and western Genesee Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 456 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a narrow line of showers with embedded thunder and heavy rainfall over the northern Niagara Frontier. Reduced visibility in this activity will make driving slower, thus allow extra time to reach your destination this late afternoon. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Buffalo, Cheektowaga, Niagara Falls, West Seneca, North Tonawanda, Clarence, Lockport, Kenmore, Depew, Tonawanda, Amherst, Lancaster, Williamsville, Darien Lakes State Park, Grand Island, Elma, Pendleton, Marilla, Pembroke and Bennington. This includes Interstate 90 between exits 48A and 52A. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
